coding_practice.title: Minimum Size Subarray Sum
coding_practice.description: Given an array of positive integers nums and a positive integer target, return the minimal length of a subarray whose sum is greater than or equal to target. If there is no such subarray, return 0 instead.

examples.explanation: The subarray [4,3] has the minimal length under the problem constraint.

coding_practice.follow up: If you have figured out the O(n) solution, try coding another solution of which the time complexity is O(n log(n)).
coding_practice.explanation:
1. 使用滑動窗口，初始化 left 為 0，total 為 0，min_len 為無限大。
2. 遍歷右指針 right，每次將 nums[right] 加入 total。
3. 當 total >= target 時，更新 min_len 並縮小左指針 left，同時減去 total。
4. 遍歷完成後，若 min_len 仍為無限大，返回 0，否則返回 min_len。
